alert.note: Alert for Custer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 6:25PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Custer County through 700 PM CDT... At 625 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Litchfield, or 29 miles north of Kearney, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mason City, Block Hill Basin and Gavin Siding. This includes Highway 2 between mile markers 298 and 307. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
